title: my.UQ - The University of Queensland, Australia

header.title: Master of Applied Linguistics (MAppLing)
header.summaryDescription:
Complete 32 units for one of the following:

  • 32 units for MAppLing - 2 year full-time duration, or
  • 32 units for MAppLing - 1.5 year full-time duration (24 units of study and 8 units for prior learning), or
  • 32 units for MAppLing - 1 year full time duration (16 units of study and 16 units for prior learning)
header.ruleLogic: Part A OR Part B OR Part C
Part A.1 AND Part A.2 AND ( Part A.3 OR Part A.4 )

header.title: MAppLing - 2 year full-time duration
header.summaryDescription:
Complete 32 units comprising:

  • 8 units for MAppLing Foundational Courses, and
  • 8 units for all MAppLing Core Courses, and
  • Either:
  • 16 units for MAppLing Dissertation Option, or
  • 16 units for MAppLing Portfolio Option

selectionRule.text: Complete [N] units for ALL of the following:

curriculumReference.name: Teaching Languages in a Global Context

header.ruleLogic: Part B.1 AND ( Part B.2 OR Part B.3 ) AND Part B.4

header.title: MAppLing - 1.5 year full-time duration (24 units of study and 8 units for prior learning)
header.summaryDescription:
Complete 32 units comprising:

  • 8 units for all MAppLing Core Courses , and
  • Either:
  • 16 units for MAppLing Dissertation Option, or
  • 16 units for MAppLing Portfolio Option, and
  • 8 units for all Approved recognised prior study and/or work experience

header.title: MAppLing - 1 year full time duration (16 units of study and 16 units for prior learning)
header.summaryDescription:
Complete 32 units comprising:

  • 8 units for all MAppLing Core Courses, and
  • Either:
  • 8 units for MAppLing Fields of Study Option, or
  • 8 units for MAppLing No Field of Study Option, and
  • 16 units for all Approved recognised prior study and/or work experience
